title: I have -3 lp
body:
So i just got promoted and i had 0 lp in bronze II right then i dodged champ select (by accident i thought it would bring up the tab but it didnt fix that glitch too pls) and so now i have -3 lp I am majorly confused pls fix this glitch.
Edit: I relogged and i dont have a timer now so i am confused.

replies.body: [Queue dodging](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) will result in a loss of 3 LP and short lower priority queue as a first offence.  Continuing to queue dodge will escalate that penalty.  It's important that you don't leave further games since you are currently in the negative, as losing a match could result in a demotion.  Hope that helps clear things up!

Thanks i was just confused on having negative lp I did not mean to dodge just 90% of the time or more the window pops up when i have to pick or ban so i was in another tab and it didn't pop up. Thanks for the explanation though!

Queue dodging at 0 LP will result in you dropping to negative LP, otherwise there would be no penalty for queue dodging at 0 LP other than a time penalty. Unless you want to Riot to let you be demoted when queue dodging at 0 LP.
